featured.text: A laser clock would be installed on top of the Arc de Triomphe at the top of the Champs Elysees and three laser beams would pick out the hands showing the hours, minutes and seconds in the millennium countdown, Tiberi said.

definition.zh_def: 激光，一種能夠發出高度集中光束的裝置，通常用於醫療、通信和工業等領域。
definition.en_def: A laser is a device that emits a highly focused beam of light, commonly used in medical, communication, and industrial applications.
definition.example: The surgeon used a laser to perform the delicate operation.
